description:
Update Your Software Instantly to Keep All Software at Best

IObit Software Updater is a user-friendly tool designed to keep your software up-to-date and secure. It scans for outdated programs and updates them with one click, reducing vulnerabilities and improving performance. With a large software database, it also helps you find and install essential applications.
v8.2 (2025-11-12)
- Added update support for 20+ popular programs such as Android Studio, FortiClient, Ruby, pgAdmin, and Transmission
- Fixed the occasional incorrect update detection for some software
- Fixed all known bugs
